A Multifaceted Approach

Risk Management and Patient Safety

Accuro pro knowledgeable and experienced team can provide risk management services tailored to your practice. We focus on understanding what type of issues lead to claims and partner with you to help you identify strategies you can implement to reduce your claims exposure.

Our comprehensive risk management services, which are complementary to Accuro pro insureds, include:

  • Data-driven analysis of claims experience to assess exposure and identify best practices
  • Tailored evaluations of clinical and operational practices to reduce risk and improve patient care and overall performance
  • Ongoing support for all of your risk management questions or concerns

Peer Support Program

Accuro pro has created a new and innovative program designed to assist our physicians when they face unexpected complications, medical errors, or malpractice litigation. This program is intended to help support our physicians when they encounter these stressful experiences.
